Right.

OK, thank you.

Come in.
-[exhales] So, sit. -OK.

Thank you.
Just give me a few minutes, let me, um, fix this up. I'll be right back.

So did you find anything incriminating?
Could I have found anything incriminating?

translation.en: -Sure? -Of course.
OK.
Oh my God, for the next three days,

I'm Kevin.
Isoken.
Ee-so-ken.
Yeah, that's pretty good.

What do you know about him?

That was bad, wasn't it?
Terrible.
He's a friend of mine.
I'm a big fan of his.

Good night.

Oh my God!

I can't go through it again. I just,

do for... I give up.

[clears throat] OK, wait now, I'm reading it!

OK... [groans]

Oh, right...

translation.ja: アグネス 聞いて ガーナのスパイシーで―

translation.en: eh, succulent, finger licking Ghana jollof...
translation.ja: ジューシーな― 料理は病みつきになる

translation.en: Please stop flattering me!
Ghana jollof... never hear the last of it.
translation.ja: ガーナね イソケン

translation.en: There are no fine single boys around here, you know?
translation.ja: まともな独身男性がいない

translation.en: Sexy guys we can play around with.
Wrong party, honey.
I know...
Shit!
-What? -Shit, shit.
-What? -Don't freak out.
What is it?
Kevin is here.
Oh my God...
Chuks was supposed to come with me, and he said I should meet him here.
translation.ja: チュークスとここで会う約束した

translation.en: I didn't think he would come with Kevin!
[sighs] What will I do now?
Clash of the Titans. If white boy and Saze fight here, me, I'm behind Saze.
translation.ja: 「タイタンの戦い」ね オイボとオサゼが戦うならオサゼにかける

translation.en: You know white people have soft noses, one punch...
translation.ja: オイボの鼻は柔らかい 一撃で…

translation.en: Agnes!
Just joking, sorry.
Oh, hi...
I'm going to kill you.
-Hi, Kevin. -Hi.
How are you?
I'm OK. It's good to see you again.
Good to see you.
-Hi. -Hi.
-How are you? -I'm good. How are you?
translation.ja: 元気？ ええ あなたは？

translation.en: I'm OK.
If you could just excuse me, I need to... yeah...
♪ It's about to go down ♪
Oh, sorry.
Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't mean to be in your way.
Kukua told me it was empty.
Of course she did. Kukua...
Um... you've spilled something on your dress.
Really?
I wasn't going to say anything, but...
translation.ja: 言うつもりなかったけど

translation.en: I'm serious.
OK, where?
I couldn't help myself.
I see.
You know, I never did get a chance to say thank you for the birthday present.
translation.ja: 誕生日プレゼントのお礼を言ってなかった

translation.en: It truly was the most thoughtful gift I've ever received, so...
translation.ja: 心のこもった贈り物だった

translation.en: I'm glad you liked it.
I loved it.
Listen, um... I've got something to confess.
translation.ja: 聞いてくれ 君に白状するよ

translation.en: I practically bullied Chuks into bringing me here today,
translation.ja: チュークスを脅して連れてきてもらった

translation.en: because I wanted to see you.
I've been so angry lately...
translation.ja: 最近とても― 腹が立ってた

translation.en: angry at you,
angry at me.
I just wanted to get past this,
but every time I tried, I just kept thinking about you
translation.ja: でも君のことを考えてしまう

translation.en: and all the things I love about you.
Like how passionate you are, and stubborn,
but at the same time, kind of goofy and awkward,
translation.ja: そそっかしいところもある

translation.en: and you do this really cute thing with your chin when you smile.
translation.ja: 笑うと あごがかわいい

translation.en: What I'm trying to say is...
don't marry him.
Don't...
because I love you.
And I know you love me too.
So choose us.
How are you?
Fine.
Are you sure about that?
Daddy,
[sighs] this wedding planning is just stressing me out.
translation.ja: 結婚式の準備で疲れてる

translation.en: So take it easy now, hm? Take it easy.
Daddy, I have a difficult decision to make.
translation.ja: 難しい決断を迫られてる

translation.en: You know, since you've been a little child,
you've always taken it upon yourself
to ensure everybody else is happy,
translation.ja: 他のみんなの幸せを優先させてきた

translation.en: often to the detriment of your own happiness, hm?
translation.ja: 自分の幸せを犠牲にしても

translation.en: Listen, listen, listen. Listen, Isoken,
translation.ja: よく聞いてくれ イソケン

translation.en: it's not your duty to make everybody happy.
translation.ja: みんなを幸せにするのはお前の務めではない

translation.en: You don't have to take a decision
translation.ja: 自分が惨めになる決断はするな

translation.en: that will make you miserable just because you want to please anybody,
translation.ja: 自分が惨めになる決断はするな 他の人を喜ばせるために

translation.en: not me, not even your mother.
Nobody should put you under such pressure, hm?
translation.ja: 誰にも気を遣わなくていい

translation.en: Look at me. Look at me. Look at me...
translation.ja: さあ パパを見て こっちを見て

translation.en: I have watched you blossom into such an amazing young woman,
translation.ja: お前が美しい女性に成長するのを見守ってきた

translation.en: and I am so very proud of you,
translation.ja: パパはそんなお前をとても誇りに思う

translation.en: and don't you ever, ever doubt it, hm?
translation.ja: そのことに自信を持っていい

translation.en: -Come, come, come on, baby. -[music crescendos]
translation.ja: おいで こっちにおいで

translation.en: Come on, don't be so hard on yourself.
translation.ja: 自分を責めないで いいな

translation.en: I know you'll make the right decision.
translation.ja: お前なら正しい決断ができる

translation.en: ♪ You let me drift away ♪
Not too smoky!
Wow, I love this.
Babes, full drama!
Beautiful!
It's OK, they'll see! I need a selfie.
translation.ja: 〈見せるのが楽しみ〉 写真を撮ろう

translation.en: Come on, smile.
How beautiful.
Hey, you... Done?
OK, go get the hair stylist.
Agnes.
Yes, love.
Could you please get Saze to come up to meet me here?
translation.ja: オサゼを呼んできてくれる？

translation.en: For what? Why?
Isoken, it's your pre-wedding dinner.
Everyone is waiting. We're late already.
If you want time alone with Saze, why don't you wait till later tonight?
Please, just get him.
Babes, I don't understand you anymore.
translation.ja: 何考えてるのか分からない

translation.en: You're dressed... Where is this hairstylist?
translation.ja: 何考えてるのか分からない ヘアスタイリストは？

translation.en: Agnes!
Fine. I'll get him.
Hey, you look beautiful.
Hey...
You're perfect, Saze.
Everything about you is perfect.
Any woman would be lucky to be your wife.
translation.ja: 誰もがあなたの妻になりたがる

translation.en: And you're perfect too, babe.
What's going on? You don't want to go through with this?
I thought I did. I really wanted to
translation.ja: したいと思った みんなもそれを望んでた

translation.en: because everyone else wanted to but...
translation.ja: みんなもそれを望んでた

translation.en: What are you saying? You're not making any sense.
translation.ja: 何言ってる？意味が分からない

translation.en: Saze, everything with us happened so quickly!
translation.ja: 何もかも あっという間に決まった

translation.en: One minute, we're just getting to know each other, and then the next thing, I'm picking out wedding outfits and...
translation.ja: 知り合ったと思ったらアソエビを選んでた

translation.en: I'm just thinking to myself the whole time
that why does this feel like this? Why do I feel like a guest at my own wedding?
translation.ja: 自分の結婚式なのになぜ客の気分なの？

translation.en: I'm supposed to be so much happier than this!
translation.ja: もっと幸せなはずなのに

translation.en: Is this about my mum? I know she can be a handful...
translation.ja: 母のせい？ 確かに母は…

translation.en: No, it's not about your mum; it's not about mine.
translation.ja: 違う　そうじゃない 私の母も関係ない

translation.en: Saze, it just doesn't feel right.
translation.ja: 正しい選択だと思えない

translation.en: Did you ever notice that I never said yes?
translation.ja: 私は“イエス”と言ってない

translation.en: I never even got a chance to say yes.
Wait, this is... this is about that guy, isn't it?
You know, from the moment I saw him, I...
You've been with him all this while, right?
Saze, I...
You know what? Don't even answer that, don't...
translation.ja: もういい 答えなくていい

translation.en: This is bullshit.
Who does this, Isoken?
Everyone that cares about us is waiting for us downstairs.
translation.ja: 俺たちの家族や友人が下で待ってる

translation.en: Our wedding is in a week... a freaking week, Isoken!
translation.ja: 結婚式まで１週間 １週間なんだぞ

translation.en: And you choose to do this now?
I'm sorry...
This is bullshit... This is bullshit!
I'm sorry.
I'm sorry.
I'm sorry.
Maybe Auntie was right, you know?
translation.ja: おばさんは正しかった

translation.en: About what?
About a year ago, she said
translation.ja: １年前に 霊的夫に付きまとわれてると言われた

translation.en: that I have a spiritual husband that's chasing me.
translation.ja: 霊的夫に付きまとわれてると言われた

translation.en: So she needed to take me to her pastor for deliverance!
translation.ja: 牧師に救済をお願いすべきだと

translation.en: -I've heard all sorts! -[grunts]
It's official, my life is a soap opera.
translation.ja: 私の人生はメロドラマよ

translation.en: I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry I'm laughing but...
translation.ja: ごめんなさい 笑ったりしてごめん

translation.en: Please laugh, laugh well.
I mean, the drama in our family?
translation.ja: 私たちの家族がドラマに？

translation.en: We need our own reality TV show. The Kardashians, they have nothing on us.
translation.ja: 独自のリアリティー番組をやるべきね

translation.en: I second that motion.
Do you remember when I was going into labor and she wanted to anoint my vajayjay for...

translation.en: -[together] ...holy delivery! -I remember! Oh my God, so nuts!
translation.ja: 聖なる出産のため 覚えてる 本当にママってイカれてる

translation.en: [exhales] Auntie Stella...
She's cray cray, man, cray cray!
You have a lot of courage though, you know?
Me?
Yes, you. I mean, you called off your wedding to Saze.
translation.ja: ええ そうよ オサゼとの結婚を取りやめた

translation.en: Do you know how many women would kill to marry Saze?

translation.en: You know, maybe that's the thing.
translation.ja: それが― イヤなのかも

translation.en: Maybe I'm just too much of an idealist.
No, no, you're not.
You know what you want,
and you have the courage not to settle for less.
translation.ja: 妥協しない勇気がある

translation.en: Courage?
OK. Where's the courage now
translation.ja: そうね ケビンに愛を伝える勇気は？

translation.en: for me to tell Kevin that I love him?
translation.ja: ケビンに愛を伝える勇気は？

translation.en: Do you know that there's a send forth for him tonight because he leaves Nigeria tomorrow?
translation.ja: 彼は明日ナイジェリアをたつ今夜は送別会

translation.en: -What? -Yup.
Why aren't you going?
No, there's no point.
It's probably not gonna work out, anyway. I mean...
translation.ja: うまくいかない オイボの夫なんてママは私を殺して自殺する

translation.en: Besides, Mum would rather kill herself and me before she ever has a white son-in-law.
translation.ja: オイボの夫なんてママは私を殺して自殺する

translation.en: No.
Where did getting married to please Mum get me?
translation.ja: ママのために結婚した私は？

translation.en: I mean,
I love Tega, and I would kill for my children
translation.ja: 夫を愛してるし子供たちは私の命

translation.en: but sometimes, I wish...
Like I wish I had just told them that I wasn't ready, you know?
translation.ja: まだ結婚したくないと言えばよかった

translation.en: Or I just told them that I needed a little bit more time.
translation.ja: もう少し時間が必要だと

translation.en: I don't know what I'm doing, Isoken.
And between the school runs and taking care of Tega,
translation.ja: 学校の用事と夫の世話をしてると―

translation.en: there's no more time for me.
I don't know who I am anymore.
Aw, don't say that, baby sis.
translation.ja: そんなこと言わないで

translation.en: I know who you are.
-You're an amazing mother and wife, Reme. -[scoffs]
translation.ja: レメはすばらしい母であり妻

translation.en: You're passionate and kind and beautiful...
translation.ja: 情熱的で優しくて美しい

translation.en: -Yeah. -...and smart.
-Keep going. -[laughs]
You're only 28, love. You have the whole world ahead of you.
translation.ja: あなたは まだ28歳 まだこれからよ

translation.en: Wait, I just wish I could press the reset button, you know?
But you don't need a reset button, sis.
All you have to do is just take it one day at a time.
Yeah. I love you.
I love you too.
[exhales] Speaking of which,
I think I'm ready for that family intervention right now.
translation.ja: 家族からの非難を受けに行くわ

translation.en: -Are you sure? -Yeah.
Cause I could just tell them that you were sleeping when I got here.
Nah, nah, let's do this. I'm ready for them. What?
translation.ja: いいのよ 私はやるわよ

translation.en: OK...
Bring it, man! Let me just...
translation.ja: 受けて立つわ　手を貸して…

translation.en: I'm gonna drive, OK?
-Yeah, wise baby sister. -[laughs]
Wise.
When I say let me pray for you,
translation.ja: 祈った方がいいと言ったのに―

translation.en: you'll be running away. You see?
translation.ja: 聞かなかった ほらね

translation.en: How can a 35-year-old woman break up her own engagement?
translation.ja: なぜ35歳の女性が結婚式を自分でぶち壊すの？

translation.en: Auntie Isoken, you didn't do well.
You should've at least allowed me to collect some millions from that guy before you broke up with him.
translation.ja: 別れる前に少し稼がせてほしかった

translation.en: What's wrong with you?
What?
Sister! Mama Isoken!
translation.ja: お姉さん イソケンのママ

translation.en: You are sitting down there.
Won't you let us go and beg the King of Kings,
translation.ja: 王様や神に祈りに行くべきよ

translation.en: God of Gods so that this child...
translation.ja: 王様や神に祈りに行くべきよ この子が…

translation.en: Wait... please!
Isoken,
-are you gay? -What?
Yes!
I have been sitting here cracking my head.
translation.ja: ここで頭をたたいて考えた

translation.en: The last time you had a boyfriend was when you were 28.
Before then, you brought home only two.
translation.ja: その前は２人連れてきた

translation.en: Now, by yourself,
you have gone ahead and told your Saze you can't marry him,
translation.ja: 勝手にオサゼに断った

translation.en: a man like that!
It means you don't want to marry anybody else!
translation.ja: 誰とも結婚しないのね

translation.en: Mum, she's not gay. She likes somebody else.
translation.ja: 同性愛者じゃない好きな人がいる

translation.en: -Really? -What's wrong with you?
Who?
His name is Kevin. He's English.
translation.ja: 名前はケビン 英語の人

translation.en: What is wrong with this girl? Don't we all speak English?
Exactly.
-He's white. -What?
-White? -Yes.
I know this girl is going to disgrace me!
translation.ja: 親に恥をかかせる子ね

translation.en: This girl has disgraced me!
I knew it! I knew it!
Isoken, why can you not be normal like your sisters?
translation.ja: なぜ妹みたいに普通になれないの？

translation.en: Why can you not be normal?
Are you the only one who went to school in England?
translation.ja: 〈あなただけロンドンの大学に行った〉

translation.en: Enough, Mummy, enough!
translation.ja: ママ もううんざり

translation.en: I nearly married Saze,
who would have made me miserable,
just because I wanted to please you.
translation.ja: ママを喜ばせたかった

translation.en: So that maybe just for once,
translation.ja: 人生で一度でいいから―

translation.en: for once in my life, I can say I finally did something to make Mummy happy,
translation.ja: 人生で一度でいいから― ママを幸せにできると思った

translation.en: to make you proud of me.
But I know now that will never happen...
translation.ja: でもママは満足しない

translation.en: unless I do exactly what you want me to do,
translation.ja: ママの言うとおりにしないかぎり

translation.en: and that's not gonna happen.
Because you know what?
I'm not normal.
What?
I never was, and I never will be.
translation.ja: これまでも― これからも

translation.en: So the earlier you start to accept that, Mummy, the better!
translation.ja: もっと早く認めてくれたら― よかった

translation.en: And lest I forget,
I'm gonna tell Kevin that I love him
translation.ja: ケビンに愛してると伝えてくる

translation.en: and that I want to be with him.
So if you ever want to see your grandchildren,
you better get on board.
Isoken, Isoken!
It's OK, it's OK.
translation.ja: 大丈夫 どうなってる？

translation.en: Reme, I'm going to need a ride.
Hey, don't worry, don't worry.
I will take you myself.
I'm coming along!
-Mike! -What?
translation.ja: マイク 何だ　何だよ

translation.en: You can sit if you want to.
Aren't you coming?
translation.ja: そこに座ってて あおいでて

translation.en: -Auntie Stella? You too? -Mm-hm.
Wow! Come on, let's go.
Belt up!
What?
What is it?
-[mumbling] -OK, Isoken, move to the back.
translation.ja: イソケン 後ろに行って

translation.en: My love, my love!
[flatters] Ye-Isoken!
Hi.
Didn't expect to see you here.
I know. Can we go over there and get some privacy, please?
translation.ja: そうね 向こうで２人で話せる？

translation.en: Yeah, sure. Mind your head.
translation.ja: いいよ 気をつけて

translation.en: So, how have you been?
I've been good. How have you been?
Yeah, I've been OK.
OK, so, um...
I know it's probably not gonna make much of a difference,
translation.ja: あなたは明日出発するから

translation.en: especially since you're leaving tomorrow and everything, but...
translation.ja: 何も変わらないと思うけど―

translation.en: I just wanted to tell you that I love you, Kevin,
translation.ja: あなたに伝えたかった 愛してると

translation.en: and I'm sorry that it's taken me so long to tell you this,
translation.ja: こんなに時間がかかってごめん

translation.en: but I love you, and I choose you. I choose us.
translation.ja: あなたを選ぶ　私たちを選ぶ

translation.en: [MC] Mr. Groom, please do not swallow the bride!
translation.ja: 新郎さん新婦を飲み込まないで

translation.en: Distinguished guests, ladies and gentlemen,
please give it up for the couple of the year,
translation.ja: 今年のカップルククアとチュークスに

translation.en: Kukua and Chuks! Make some noise!
translation.ja: 今年のカップルククアとチュークスに 盛大な拍手を

translation.en: Hold on, can I get some grilled fish and plantain instead?
translation.ja: 待って 魚に変えてくれないか

translation.en: But you said you wanted rice.
Reme, I saw them serving fish,
translation.ja: レメ 魚がおいしそうだったから気が変わった

translation.en: it looked nice, so I changed my mind like...
translation.ja: 魚がおいしそうだったから気が変わった

translation.en: [scoffs] You know what?
You can go ahead and get the fish yourself,
and by the way, I'm going back to work!
Stop running!
-Hey. -Hi, can I get you something?
translation.ja: やあ ハイ 何か食べる？

translation.en: Um, actually...
Actually, I have that sorted already.
translation.ja: 実は もう私が用意した

translation.en: Hey, hi. Um... Uh...
Yinka, this is my girlfriend, uh, Tina.
translation.ja: 僕の彼女だ ティナ

translation.en: -Girlfriend? -Yes.
Yes, girlfriend. Nice to meet you.
translation.ja: そうよ　彼女 よろしくね

translation.en: This is my colleague, Yinka.
My friend, stop that!
What now, eh?
Can't a man feel up on his wife?
Or you don't want baby number two?
No, please! My body has not even recovered yet.
translation.ja: 〈無理よ〉 体も回復してない

translation.en: Ain't nobody got time for that!
You're not having it, are you?
-Come here! -OK, I got a little time.
translation.ja: おいで 少しならいいわ

translation.en: -That's my girl. -[laughs]
If you had introduced me to your friend,
this could have been our wedding.
-Uncle, you? Wedding? -Yes.
Please! [chuckles]
Look, I forgive you.
You can make it up to me.
That your friend there, you can introduce her to me, Agnes.
Agnes?
No offence, Uncle Mike, but I think Agnes would eat you for breakfast.
translation.ja: 悪いけどおじさんの手に負えないのでは？

translation.en: May I have this dance?
Isoken tells me you're a very good dancer,
translation.ja: ダンスが上手だと聞きました

translation.en: so please take it easy on me.
translation.ja: ダンスが上手だと聞きました お手柔らかに

translation.en: What did he say?
White boy wants to dance with you.
[laughs] Really?
Ye-Isoken, go and dance.
-He wants to dance? -Yes.
-Go dance. -What's wrong with you?
-Come on! -Dance.
-[laughs] White boy wants to dance. -["Sekem" playing]
translation.ja: いいぞ オイボとダンス

translation.en: After you.
